'''Wrathful Simulacra''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Chenyu Vale]], [[Liyue]]. It uses adeptal energy to launch water droplets that can be used for [[Golden Carp's Leap]]. Interact to enter, attack to launch, switch aiming mode to recall all water droplets, and hold jump to exit.
